verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: On Sunday] , [ARG0: Republican strategist and former congressional aide Steve Schmidt] [V: said] [ARG1: that President Trump “ beclowned himself ” and disgraced the United States at the Group of Seven ( G-7 ) summit] .
